title: SHOCKER: Scott Peterson double murder sentence reversed after wife Laci and Baby murdered.
itunes:title: SHOCKER: Scott Peterson double murder sentence reversed after wife Laci and Baby murdered.
description:
Convicted double murderer Scott Peterson's death sentence has been reversed by California's Supreme Court. The high court found that the 2002 trial in the deaths of Peterson's wife Laci and their unborn son was fair; those murder convictions will stand.

However, the court found that potential jurors were wrongly dismissed by the judge after they expressed general objections to the death penalty on a questionnaire. What happens now?

Joining Nancy Grace Today:

Joining Nancy Grace Today:

  • Lara Yeretsian - Los Angeles, Ca. Criminal Defense Attorney,
  • Dr Debbie Joffe-Ellis - Psychologist, Adjunct Professor at Columbia University  
  • Steven Lampley - Former Detective, Author of "12 and Murdered" available August 28th on Amazon
  • Jennifer Shen, Forensic Pathologist, Former San Diego Police Department Crime Lab Director
  • Alexis Tereszcuk - CrimeOnline Investigative Reporter 



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
